sentence: Why is it so difficult for people with breast cancer to remember things? they have bad mammaries.
explanation: In the context of the joke, mammary refers to breast tissue. In a different context, it refers to a concept related to mothers (mammal-related).
first_new_sentence: The mammary glands produce milk for nursing young.
second_new_sentence: The mother was very protective of her children, showing her nurturing side as a true mammal.

sentence: Why are statistics more believable with a larger sample size? the ns justify the means.
explanation: In the context of the joke, means refers to a method or process. In a different context, it refers to resources or wealth someone possesses.
first_new_sentence: The means of transportation available in the city are very efficient.
second_new_sentence: He had the means to start his own business thanks to an inheritance.

sentence: What do you call sex on a beach? intercoarse.
explanation: In the context of the joke, coarse refers to roughness. In a different context, it refers to a type of texture or quality.
first_new_sentence: The sand on the beach was rough and quite coarse underfoot.
second_new_sentence: The fabric of the shirt was too coarse for my sensitive skin.

sentence: Feel free to let me know if you need anything else!
